text: Consider the game tree in Figure 3 and then answer the questions that follow (the static utility values for the leaf nodes are provided below each leaf node). 7 9 8 9 Lh| 12 4 1 Figure 3: Adversarial Search Tree (a) Suppose a Minimax search is performed on the tree. Provide the min-max values for nodes A, B.C, and F. (4) (b) Suppose a Minimax search with Alpha/Beta pruning is done in a left-to-right fashion on the tree. Provide the o and 3 values for nodes A, B, C, and F which would have been recorded during the search (the values when the search terminates). (8)
